overview.en:
LuckyPlaza is the largest DAPP game ecosystem on EOS. The platform was launched in August 2018. At present, a number of self-operated and tripartite development games have been launched, and the quality of the game has been well received by players.
LKT is a platform token based on LuckyPlaza. Permissions include, for example, game bonuses, game usage tokens, and more. The price of LKT has risen many times since its launch and is still rising rapidly.
